storyInfo: The last Steam Knight rises from the depths of the mausoleum, intent on punishing any who would transgress against fair Victoria.

attributes.content: In front of you, Siege!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Is that...?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: A suit of steam armor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The spurts of white steam stand out in front of the dark hue of the armor.
Spurt after spurt.
Like breathing.
The fog parts before him. He awakens from history.
Nothing can stop him. Nothing can defeat him.
Not abandonment, not betrayal.
Not even death.
It's moving! Look, it's moving!
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: Man alive, what is happening here?!
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: Agh! Bolts do nothing!
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Get the grenades!
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: The massive suit of armor rises from the rubble.
Heavy footsteps.
Heavy gushing.
It walks toward the panicked crowd, one step at a time.
(Heavy gushing)
attributes.name: 'Steam Armor'

attributes.content: There's no point.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: You're from Sargon, Totter. You wouldn't understand.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: They were the stuff of our bedtime stories.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: It's still stories of the Steam Knights I tell when I put my kids to bed.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: How are we supposed to defeat him?
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: How do we defeat our pride, our glory, our hero, who's already been betrayed once?
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: We can't defeat him.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: This is a... a Victorian Steam Knight.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: Fall back! Fall back!
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: What's that sound?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Sounds like steam.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: How?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Definitely steam. They're back!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I know I backed the right one! This is where Vina hid her joker!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Morgan, we've got the Steam Knights on our side!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: There are Steam Knights left in Londinium? Here?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Are they guarding the Mausoleum of Kings? The Sighs of Kings?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Ha, who cares what they're doing?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Vina is their king!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: When we come out up top with the Steam Knights, those Sarkaz will... hey, Morgan, what's that look on your face for?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Vina's gonna get the Sighs of Kings.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Four years. The Steam Knights have stayed by the sword for four years, in this sunless dungeon.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: They didn't show up when the Sarkaz occupied the city. They didn't show up when the Sarkaz took over the factories. They didn't show up when the Sarkaz burned the noble houses.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: What do they think?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Are they gonna side with intruders into the Mausoleum of Kings?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Take your weapon, Morgan.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: They're strong... they're all around us.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hah, this is getting interesting.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Why are the hoodlums of Norport here?
The Glasgow Gang? Under Alexandrina?
Show your face, now!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hmph. There are enough variables without that sound of gushing steam rising in Londinium again.
What would the Duke think if she knew there were survivors among the Steam Knights?
Would she be uneasy? Or glad that the glorious heroes of old have returned?
Ha, glory...
Let's take care of the hoodlums. Don't let them get in Allerdale's way.
(Heavy gushing)
attributes.name: 'Steam Armor'

attributes.content: ...Steam Knights.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Four years... there are survivors among the Steam Knights?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Those marks... they should have been lethal wounds. The Sarkaz spikes destroyed the cores. There's no way the wearer would survive.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Plus, no one could enter or leave the Mausoleum of Kings without the royal key.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: He's spent four years in this dark dungeon...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Even if he survived the initial carnage, how could he have survived in this place?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: What does the man in the armor look like now?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: (Heavy gushing)
attributes.name: 'Steam Armor'

attributes.content: Who are... you...?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: No... what are you?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: A flame sparks in the helmet of the armor.
Allerdale can feel a cold gaze upon herself.
Upon everyone here.
The flame...
The armor roaring in the flames.
It was a dream from her childhood.
Her hope for salvation.
The destruction that she witnessed with her own eyes.
A nightmare, too terrible to gaze upon.
He is back. Back before her.
Allerdale cannot keep herself from trembling.
Have you come to settle this?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: (Heavy gushing)
attributes.name: 'Steam Armor'

attributes.content: Allerdale!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Look out!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Steam Knight, I am Alexandrina Vina Victoria, heir to the Aslan kings.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Halt your attack, knight.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We are not your enemies.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Siege hears a voice echo above her head.
Was it the Steam Knight? She is unsure. It sounded more like the rumbling of a machine than a human voice.
The spurts of white steam become more rapid and forceful.
The dark knight raises his massive weapon towards her.
'Victoria.'
Siege suddenly understands. The Steam Knight is not calling her name.
It is looking at her sword.
The Sighs of Kings, the symbol of the royal house of Victoria.
'Victoria.'
attributes.name: 'The Last Steam Knight'

attributes.content: He called the sword Victoria.
The Victoria that he swore to defend unto his last breath.
Glorious Victoria betrayed him. Now, he will defend the symbol of Victoria.
The last knight of the empire shall take revenge on all those who transgress against her.
He charges towards the heir to the throne.
Get out of the way, Siege!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Why did the Steam Knight attack you?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Can't he tell...?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Get down!
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Argh... *cough*...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: The sword of fire...
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Don't let it hit you!
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: It's gone mad! We can't stop it!
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: Get out of here! Get out! Get out...
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: We'll all be dead before long.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Get your men out.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Do as Vina says.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Mission aborted, then.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Looks like my retirement plan will have to wait.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Dagda, take the mercs and get out.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your Highness!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You're the last one who bowed to them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Take their story back, let it see the light of day.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The story belongs to all of us, Siege.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: We should tell it together.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I don't know what's come over you, Allerdale.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I used to respect you. I thought you were worthy of a knight's honor. No, you were a knight paragon in my mind.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Always at the forefront, not caring for fame and fortune, not afraid of any foe.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You were Cumberland the Ever on High!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Nothing can remain on High forever, Dagda.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But we fought together, didn't we?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Your story is here too, Allerdale.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: If you want to come back.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I can't do that, can I?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It depends on you.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: But first, we deal with this knight.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: My master taught me that a duel between knights must be fair and honorable.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Our foe is a glorious hero.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Allow me to stand by your side, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: ...Of course.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Fight... him?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: A pathetic, despicable, lying traitor.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: How can one like that challenge fate?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It's a wonderful fable, isn't it?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: An innocent child wanted to become a hero. But she went bad, and when the hero returned from history, she found his sword at her throat.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The story should end with her death.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: She should lose everything. Never to fulfill her destiny.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Vina, I...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I don't want to hear you talk about 'destiny' anymore, Allerdale.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hold your head high, Allerdale Cumberland. There is no such thing as destiny, for me or for you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I need to calm him down. Then, if you still want this sword, all you need to do is challenge me, and I'll abide.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: This is not your bloody destiny, Allerdale. What you want to do, do it.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But don't say that word anymore.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: (Heavy gushing)
attributes.name: 'The Last Steam Knight'

attributes.content: He's coming.
attributes.name: Allerdale
